description:
Whether you're on a consumer product (like Gmail, Search, Maps, Chrome, Android) or a business product (Google Ads, AdSense, Google Marketing Platform, Analytics), you take part in a complete marketing experience as you lead every facet of the product's journey. From determining positioning, naming, competitive analysis, feature prioritization and external communications, you help shape the voice of the product and help it grow a consumer base. This means you work with a cross-functional team across Sales, corporate communications, legal, webmasters, product development, engineering and more. In this role, you'll be involved with product marketing strategy from beginning to end.

In this role, you will be a business leader shaping future connected car technology. You will lead Android Auto marketing, from evolving the narrative of Android Auto to co-marketing and partnering with the cross-functional teams, and building new business models. You will also work closely with partner, brand, and go-to-market teams and collaboratively as part of a cross-functional team with Product/Engineering/UX, Go-to-Market, Business Development, Corporate Communications, Legal, and others.

Know the user. Know the magic. Connect the two. At its core, marketing at Google starts with technology and ends with the user, bringing both together in unconventional ways. Our job is to demonstrate how Google's products solve the world's problems--from the everyday to the epic, from the mundane to the monumental. And we approach marketing in a way that only Google can--changing the game, redefining the medium, making the user the priority, and ultimately, letting the technology speak for itself.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of B2C or B2B product marketing experience in technology space.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in product branding, launches, messaging, positioning, and targeting. Proven track record developing marketing plans through actionable insights and recommendations.
  • Experience managing external creative agencies to timeline and budget. Ability to prioritize for business impact among competing needs.
  • Experience working with internal and external partners and driving impact via professional relationships and joint agreements.
  • Experience writing consumer-facing material. Ability to influence across all levels and work effectively across functions, geographies, and corporate cultures.
  • Experience working on co-marketing campaigns, from scrappy influencer campaigns to global, integrated marketing campaigns.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills. Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Lead messaging, identity, positioning/value proposition, naming, brand architecture and communication of Android Auto. Partner with cross-functional leadership to drive product roadmap and strategy.
  • Manage all aspects of marketing for launches of new products. Drive strategy and execution of global launches, working closely with partners and regional marketing teams.
  • Manage strategy for key assets such as website, product videos, blog posts, and more. Scale Android Auto marketing messages through key partner campaigns.
  • Develop and execute scaleable creative guidance that drive Android Auto awareness, usage, and partner sales. Partner with internal teams like Google Play, Google Maps, and Google Assistant in campaigns.
title: Product Marketing Manager, Android Auto
